name: (RE)COVER
description:
Description

In (RE)COVER, you play as David, a former soldier now struggling with the symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder. With the help of The Psychiatrist, you must venture deep into your memories and your soul to vanquish the demons of the past that still haunts you.

This game started as game jam project back in 2018. After a while, we decided to go back and, now equipped with years of gamedev experience, basically rebuild it from ground up and give it the polish the game deserves.

Controls

Use WSAD or Arrow to move.

Use Mouse to aim.

Use Left Mouse Button to shoot.

Gameplay Description

In the first level, you're task is to stealth your way through the demonic guards. You do not want to engage them! 

Later on, however, you will receive some firepower to give those demons hell (pun intended). You will stroll through each room and fight your way through swarms of enemies to find an entrance to the deeper level of your consciousness so you can confront the biggest one of them all and finally be free.
